channel.description: Recent content in now on Will-Ellwood.com

item.title: Now
item.description: This is a “now page”, and I think they are a good idea. As of January 1st 2020: I am getting used to working remotely such that it's now normal for me I have started rock climbing indoors again and am planning some easy adventures for the spring As of September 23rd 2019: I have just moved to Aberdeen, Scotland I am looking to spend a lot more time writing prose and code for myself I am still listening to a lot of Earth
